meta.description: Optimize the number of seasonal and full-time volunteers to maximize gift deliveries under point and volunteer constraints.

sets.name: VOLUNTEER_TYPES
sets.description: Types of volunteers available for delivering gifts.

params.name: gifts_per_volunteer
params.description: Number of gifts each type of volunteer can deliver.

params.name: points_per_volunteer
params.description: Points awarded for each type of volunteer.

params.name: max_points
params.description: Maximum points that can be given out.

params.name: max_seasonal_ratio
params.description: Maximum ratio of volunteers that can be seasonal.

params.name: min_full_time
params.description: Minimum number of full-time volunteers required.

vars.name: num_volunteers
vars.description: Number of volunteers of each type.

objective.name: max_total_gifts
objective.description: Maximize the total number of gifts delivered by all volunteers.

constraints.name: points_constraint
constraints.description: Total points given to volunteers must not exceed the maximum allowed.

constraints.name: seasonal_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: No more than 30% of the volunteers can be seasonal.

constraints.name: min_full_time_constraint
constraints.description: At least 10 full-time volunteers are required.
